Name: Christmas Fever!
About the game: Christmas Fever! is a classic 2D platformer with extra powerups. Complete 64 different levels and try to achieve the best time possible! Don't let the Beboks spoil the holidays! Holidays are approaching, so get in the Christmas mood by playing Christmas Fever! Explore a wonderful Christmas world with a Snowman and Santa's crew. Help Santa collect coins for gifts. Avoid monsters and traps, collect gifts with specials powers to reach previously inaccessible places. If you like classic 2D platformer gameplay, challenging levels, replayability, epic adventure and christmas atmosphere, Christmas Fever! is game for You! Special Powers: - super speed - transformation into a snowball - dash jump http://{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/Gif_dashjump.gif - wall walk http://{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/Gif_wallwalk.gif
